meanings.definition: A brief summary or outline at the beginning of a chapter or section of a book.
meanings.sent1: The headnotes at the start of the chapter helped me understand the main points.
meanings.sent2: I always read the headnotes before diving into a new chapter.
meanings.sent3: The headnotes were like a sneak peek into the chapter's secrets.
meanings.sent4: Her headnotes were like a roadmap guiding readers through the chapter.
meanings.sent5: The colorful headnotes made the chapter come alive in my mind.

meanings.definition: A note at the beginning of a legal case summarizing the key points.
meanings.sent1: The headnotes in the legal case highlighted the important details.
meanings.sent2: The lawyer referred to the headnotes to grasp the case quickly.
meanings.sent3: The headnotes in the legal case were like a cheat sheet for the attorney.
meanings.sent4: His headnotes were a beacon of clarity in the complex legal document.
meanings.sent5: The judge found the headnotes extremely helpful in understanding the case.

meanings.definition: A heading or title at the top of a page or document.
meanings.sent1: The headnotes on the document made it easy to locate the information.
meanings.sent2: The headnotes at the top of the page were bold and clear.
meanings.sent3: The headnotes on the page were like a crown for the document.
meanings.sent4: The headnotes stood out like a lighthouse guiding readers through the text.
meanings.sent5: The colorful headnotes added a touch of elegance to the document.
